name: Smart Fitness Watch with Heart Rate Monitor, Sleep Tracking, 5ATM Waterproof, Compatible with iOS & Android

shipping.description: Shipped via secure express courier. Delivery within 7-10 business days.

description: Track your health and fitness with the Smart Fitness Watch. Equipped with a heart rate monitor, sleep tracking, and waterproof design, it's built for daily life. Get real-time notifications, control music, and more with just a flick of your wrist.

keyFeatures: Fitness & Activity Tracker with Steps and Calories
additionalFeatures: Long Battery Life: Up to 10 days on a single charge

keyAttributes.Packaging: Watch, charging cable, manual, retail box

name: Men's Premium Cotton Casual Shirt – Slim Fit, Breathable, Button Down

shipping.description: Ships in protective packaging. Estimated delivery time: 5–8 business days.

description: A stylish and comfortable slim fit shirt made from high-quality breathable cotton. Ideal for casual outings or semi-formal events. Soft on the skin, wrinkle-resistant, and easy to maintain.

keyFeatures: Slim Fit Design with Button-Down Collar
additionalFeatures: Available in multiple sizes (S to XXL)
Colorfast fabric – doesn’t fade after wash
Great for layering or solo wear
